title: Contemporary South Korea Escape in Suwon City with Onsite Dining & Lobby Bar
description:
Experience the vibrant energy of South Korea with a stay at this cosmopolitan hub. Located in the heart of Suwon, a city renowned for its rich history and dynamic culture, you'll be perfectly placed to explore the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Hwaseong Fortress, just a short stroll away, or savour authentic Korean cuisine at nearby Gwanggyo Lake Park.

Back at the hotel, savour live culinary artistry at The Square restaurant, or unwind at the stylish Lobby Bar with your favourite cocktail. With easy access to the city's KTX and subway stations, Seoul is under an hour away, making this your ideal South Korea stay.
offer_address: 902 Dukyoungdaero, Paldal Gu, Suwon 16622, South Korea
